Description: CLI framework - implements pixell command-line interface (build
Data validation and settings management - validates agent.yaml manifests
YAML parser - reads/writes agent.yaml and pak.yaml configuration files
JSON schema validation - validates protocol envelopes (ui.event
Web framework - development server REST API support and agent endpoint mounting
ASGI server - runs FastAPI development server with hot-reload for local agent serving
File system monitoring - hot-reload functionality in dev server
Environment variable management - loads environment variables from .env files and reads secret configuration
Table output formatting - displays agent lists in pixell list command and formats secret tables
Template engine - generates setup.py files and creates project scaffolding (pixell init)
HTTP client - makes API calls to Pixell Agent Cloud
Package building and distribution - builds pixell-kit package and auto-generates setup.py for agent packages
Python package distribution format - creates wheel distributions for faster installation
Testing framework - runs unit tests and integration tests
Test coverage plugin - measures code coverage and generates coverage reports
Async test support - tests async/await code (deployment and server tests)
Code formatter - automatically formats Python code (100 character line length)
Static type checker - type checks Python code and catches errors before runtime
Fast Python linter - code linting and style checking (Rust-based)
Package build frontend - PEP 517/518 compliant build tool
PyPI uploader - publishes pixell-kit to PyPI
PyYAML type stubs - enables type checking for YAML-related code with mypy
GnuPG Python wrapper - cryptographic signing and verification of APKG packages (security feature)
